mapper.update: update t_passby set train_no = #{trainNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_name = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approach = #{approach,jdbcType=TIME}, departure = #{departure,jdbcType=TIME}, station_order = #{stationOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT} where passby_id = #{passbyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select passby_id, train_no, station_name, approach, departure, station_order from t_passby
